title: Midterm Exam Schedule
description: The midterm exams will begin on December 5th. Please refer to the shared schedule for subject-wise details.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
description: A Parent-Teacher meeting is scheduled for November 20th to discuss student performance. Attendance is mandatory.

title: Holiday Announcement
description: The school will remain closed on November 30th on account of a public holiday.

title: Science Fair
description: The annual science fair will be held on December 15th. Students are encouraged to participate and showcase their projects.

title: New Library Books
description: The school library has added new books to its collection. Visit the library to explore the latest arrivals.
